results.definition: a painful sore with a hard core filled with pus
the temperature at which a liquid boils at sea level
examples: they brought the water to a boil

results.definition: be in an agitated emotional state
bring to, or maintain at, the boiling point
examples: boil this liquid until it evaporates

results.definition: come to the boiling point and change from a liquid to vapor
immerse or be immersed in a boiling liquid, often for cooking purposes
